name: axew
description: Desktop game engine built on three.js and Electron

scripts.package: rm -rf out/* && npm install && npm run build-prod && ./node_modules/.bin/electron-packager ./ threejsDemo --all --tmpdir=false --ignore='\.git(ignore|modules)' --ignore='source.map' --out='./out/' --asar

author: Vinay S Shenoy
